# ISO 9241-112 Clause 9 Notes (Wording Guidance)

Capture language rules before drafting onboarding copy.

## Key Excerpts
- Clause 9.2: Use familiar terms drawn from the user's domain.
- Clause 9.3: Avoid unnecessary abbreviations and explain unavoidable acronyms.
- Clause 9.4: Provide concise instructions close to the element they describe.
- Clause 9.5: Present warnings before the user commits to irreversible actions.

## Personalized Interpretation
- Translate each excerpt into your own words.
- Write one example sentence that follows the rule and another that violates it.
